name: Donald HARRIS, Petitioner v. COURT OF COMMON PLEAS PHILADELPHIA COUNTY, Respondent
name_abbreviation: Harris v. Court of Common Pleas Philadelphia County

parties: Donald HARRIS, Petitioner v. COURT OF COMMON PLEAS PHILADELPHIA COUNTY, Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 29th day of May, 2015, the Application for Leave to File Original Process is GRANTED, and the Petition for Writ of Mandamus and/or Extraordinary Relief is DENIED.
Docket entries indicate that the Court of Common Pleas of Philadelphia County has acted in compliance with the Superior Court’s April 10, 2010 remand order. See Commonwealth v. Harris, CP-51-CR-0902871-2003 (orders dated 8/15/2011; 4/23/2012; and 7/23/2012).
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
115 A.3d 310
Donald HARRIS, Petitioner v. COURT OF COMMON PLEAS PHILADELPHIA COUNTY, Respondent.
No. 24 EM 2015.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
May 29, 2015.
